result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: Uime sin ḋíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.

result.eng: I have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ga: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.orig: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theach
result.html: Níl gairdín ar bith agam faraor ach tá páirc mhór an-ghar do mo theachI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house
result.ponchtml: Níl gairdín ar biṫ agam faraor aċ tá páirc ṁór an-ġar do mo ṫeaċI have no garden, alas, but there's a big park very close to my house

result.ga: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireacht
result.orig: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireacht
result.html: Is maith liom bheith ag garraíodóireachtI like to garden.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag garraíodóireaċtI like to garden.
